name: Runway Gen-3
short_description: Professional text-to-video generation with cinematic quality output and advanced editing capabilities
long_description: Runway Gen-3 represents the cutting edge of AI video generation technology. Create professional-quality videos from text prompts with advanced features including frame interpolation, background removal, and real-time preview. Trusted by creative professionals and content creators worldwide for its consistent, high-quality output and intuitive workflow integration.

name: ChatGPT Plus
short_description: Advanced conversational AI with GPT-4 access, priority responses, and enhanced reasoning capabilities
long_description: ChatGPT Plus provides access to OpenAI's most advanced language model, GPT-4, with priority access during peak times. Features superior reasoning, creativity, and accuracy for complex tasks including writing, analysis, coding, and research. Essential for professionals requiring reliable, high-quality AI assistance.

name: GitHub Copilot
short_description: AI-powered code completion and suggestions with multi-language support and IDE integration
long_description: GitHub Copilot uses advanced AI to provide intelligent code completion, suggestions, and entire function generation across 40+ programming languages. Seamlessly integrates with popular IDEs including VS Code, JetBrains, and Neovim. Trained on billions of lines of public code to assist developers with context-aware suggestions.

name: Midjourney
short_description: High-quality AI image generation with artistic styles, detailed prompts, and commercial licensing
long_description: Midjourney creates stunning AI-generated images with exceptional artistic quality and consistency. Features detailed prompting system, various artistic styles, high-resolution output up to 8K, and full commercial licensing. Preferred by designers, marketers, and content creators for its superior aesthetic quality and reliable results.

name: ElevenLabs
short_description: Realistic AI voice generation and cloning with multi-language support and API integration
long_description: ElevenLabs provides industry-leading AI voice synthesis and cloning technology. Create realistic voices, clone existing voices with just minutes of audio, support for 30+ languages, and robust API for integration. Used by podcasters, content creators, and enterprises for professional voice generation at scale.

name: Notion AI
short_description: AI writing assistant integrated into Notion workspace for enhanced productivity and collaboration
long_description: Notion AI seamlessly integrates AI writing capabilities directly into your Notion workspace. Generate content, summarize notes, create action items, and enhance team productivity with intelligent writing assistance. Perfect for teams already using Notion for project management and documentation.
